org.nasdanika.html.echarts

Interface EChartsFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEChartsFactory

    public interface EChartsFactory
    Factory interface for building charts.
    Author:
    Pavel

      • init

        String init(String id,
            org.json.JSONObject option)
        Creates an initialization script for an existing HTML element with a given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of an existing HTML element.
        option - Chart option.
        Returns:
        JavaScript code to initialize the chart.

      • init

        String init(String id,
            Supplier<org.json.JSONObject> optionSupplier)
        Creates an initialization script for an existing HTML element with a given ID.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of an existing HTML element.
        optionSupplier - Chart option supplier, e.g. OptionBuilder.
        Returns:
        JavaScript code to initialize the chart.

      • init

        String init(HTMLElement<?> htmlElement,
            org.json.JSONObject option)
        Creates an initialization script for an existing HTML element. If the element already has an id, that id is used, otherwise it is generated and set by this call.
        Parameters:
        htmlElement - Chart's DOM container.
        option - Option
        Returns:
        JavaScript code to initalize the chart.

      • init

        String init(HTMLElement<?> htmlElement,
            Supplier<org.json.JSONObject> optionSupplier)
        Creates an initialization script for an existing HTML element. If the element already has an id, that id is used, otherwise it is generated and set by this call.
        Parameters:
        htmlElement - Chart's DOM container.
        optionSupplier - Chart option supplier, e.g. OptionBuilder.
        Returns:
        JavaScript code to initalize the chart.

      • create

        Fragment create(org.json.JSONObject option,
                Object width,
                Object height)
        Creates a DIV to contain a chart and a script tag with chart initialization code.
        Parameters:
        option - Chart option.
        width - Optional container width.
        height - Optional container height.
        Returns:
        Fragment with the chart container and initialization script.

      • create

        Fragment create(Supplier<org.json.JSONObject> optionSupplier,
                Object width,
                Object height)
        Creates a DIV to contain a chart and a script tag with chart initialization code.
        Parameters:
        optionSupplier - Chart option supplier, e.g. OptionBuilder.
        width - Optional container width.
        height - Optional container height.
        Returns:
        Fragment with the chart container and initialization script.

      • create

        void create(org.json.JSONObject option,
            Object width,
            Object height,
            Consumer<Object> consumer)
        Creates a DIV to contain a chart and a script tag with chart initialization code.
        Parameters:
        option - Chart option.
        width - Optional container width.
        height - Optional container height.
        consumer - Consumer to accept the generated container and script.

      • create

        void create(Supplier<org.json.JSONObject> optionSupplier,
            Object width,
            Object height,
            Consumer<Object> consumer)
        Creates a DIV to contain a chart and a script tag with chart initialization code.
        Parameters:
        optionSupplier - Chart option supplier, e.g. OptionBuilder.
        width - Optional container width.
        height - Optional container height.
        consumer - Consumer to accept the generated container and script.

        Returns:
